bug.author: evancasey
bug.summary: TF.cumsum operation is unreliable for large tensors
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
1.2.7 <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
Firefox/chrome <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
tf.cumsum will return an incorrect answer and/or take a very long time to return if you pass it a tensor of more than a couple hundred thousand values. <denchmark-h:h4>Code to reproduce the bug / link to feature request</denchmark-h>
const x = tf.zeros([1000000]); x.cumsum().print();

comments.comment: Automatically closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!
